These are very hip-hop, cool-girl jeans.
They are very loose fitting everywhere and are not a stretch denim.
They are high-waisted.
The jeans have cute metal rivets on the pockets and thank god there is no dumb logo on the pocket (or I would have sent em back).

Because I am short I will need to cut a lot off the bottom.
Keep in mind if you do cut a lot off the bottom they may loose their barrel leg shape.
